fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Lesser Limited Principle of Omniscience
fr:frontmatter.fr:meta: Defined in Varieties of constructive mathematics

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: The lesser limited principle of omniscience (LLPO for short) states that for any binary sequence \{ a_n \} _{n \in \mathbb {N} } that contains at most one 1, either \forall n \in \mathbb {N} . \ a_{2n} = 0 or \forall n \in \mathbb {N} . \ a_{2n + 1} = 0.
